biotools.summary: omicsGAT is a graph attention network based framework for cancer subtype analysis. It performs the task of classification or clustering of patient/cell samples based on the gene expression. It strives to secure important information while discarding the rest by assigning different attention coefficients to the neighbors of a sample in a network/graph.
